metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20388 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
xmlSchemaPreRun in xmlschemas.c in libxml2 2.9.10 allows an xmlSchemaValidateStream memory leak.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5build1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-5build1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-5build1').
